subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[knock]] sth. against a hard [[surface]]; to [[dash]] against a [[stone]]
# to [[knock]] an item off another item by [[hitting]] them against a hard surface
# to [[kowtow]]
# {{lb|zh|dialect|metaphor}} to [[fight]]
